original_text:
Aloha! Cluster Pays
Informazioni generali
Software: NetEnt
Rulli: 5
Linee di gioco:10
Puntata massima per linea: 0,01 €
Puntata minima per linea:20 €
Valore minimo gettone: 0,01 €
Valore massimo gettone: 0,5 €
Vincita massima: 200.000 gettoni
Return to Player (RTP): 96,4%
Aloha! Cluster Pays: caratteristiche principali
La NetEnt stavolta ci fa fare un tuffo nelle acque cristalline delle Hawaii, in un gioco divertentissimo e molto piacevole anche dal punto di vista visivo.
La grafica è veramente ben fatta: nello sfondo abbiamo una spiaggia bianchissima su cui in lontananza campeggia un vulcano; palme e fiori colorati fanno da cornice ai rulli e, immancabile, a un lato della schermata troviamo il Tiki, la scultura in origine religiosa simbolo della cultura delle isole Hawaii.
Oltre alla eccellente grafica, l’esperienza di gioco è accompagnata da effetti sonori a tema particolarmente coinvolgenti e, nel complesso, l’atmosfera offerta da questa slot è molto bella e divertente.
Non solo grafica e suoni però, Aloha! Cluster Pays si distingue dalle altre slot anche per il suo sistema di gioco, a partire dai 6 rulli al posto dei convenzionali 5, con ottime possibilità di vincita. Inoltre, il range di puntata totale va da un minimo di 0,10 € fino a un massimo di 200 €, rendendo questo adatto sia a chi di una slot apprezza maggiormente l’aspetto ludico, sia ai giocatori più intraprendenti.
L’RTP è de 96,4%, associato a una volatilità e variabilità medio/basse, il che significa che le vincite non sono elevatissime ma abbastanza frequenti.
Simboli, Wild e Scatter
I simboli di Aloha! Cluster Pays sono tutti legati al tema della cultura hawaiana e non sono presenti (anche questa è una particolarità) le classiche carte da poker.
A scorrere sui rulli troviamo ananas, dei fiori fucsia, conchiglie turchesi e il Tiki, rappresentato in diversi modi e colori: abbiamo il Tiki rosso fuoco, quello verde sorridente e quello blu che fa la linguaccia.
In questa slot ci sono sia il simbolo Wild che lo Scatter.
Aloha! Cluster Pays: modalità di gioco
La modalità di gioco di questa bella slot hawaiana è molto particolare: sei rulli e paylines non convenzionali la rendono infatti unica nel suo genere!
Il sistema di gioco prevede il pagamento non in base a un allineamento da sinistra verso destra come nella stragrande maggioranza delle altre slot, ma per raggruppamento di simboli, Cluster Pays, appunto. Per ottenere una vincita è necessario raggruppare tra 9 e 30 simboli!
Molto particolare anche il sistema di free spins: durante i giri gratis sono esclusi dal gioco i simboli che pagano di meno, fiori e conchiglie, in modo tale che in caso di vincita questa sia più ricca.
Inoltre, quando si riesce a raggruppare dei simboli, ma il cluster non è abbastanza grande per determinare una vincita, il piccolo raggruppamento resta “bloccato” sui rulli in modo tale da garantire maggiore possibilità di cluster fortunato al giro successivo.
Nella ricerca del raggruppamento vincente è possibile sfruttare il simbolo Wild, che può sostituire tutti gli altri simboli.

raw_translation.response:
Aloha! Cluster Pays is a dynamic slot game designed by NetEnt that will transport you to the crystal clear waters of Hawaii. Visually stunning, this game boasts an exceptional aesthetic with a white sandy beach backdrop, a distant volcano, and colorful flowers and palm trees. You will also find the Tiki sculpture, a religious symbol of Hawaiian culture, on the side of your screen. Immerse yourself in the authentic sounds of Hawaii, which accompanied by the vibrant graphics will have you feeling as if you're truly on the island.

This slot game stands out from the rest with its unconventional gameplay - it has six reels instead of the usual five, offering incredible chances of winning. Furthermore, the total betting range varies from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €200, making it ideal for both casual players and high rollers.

With an RTP of 96.4%, Aloha! Cluster Pays has medium to low volatility and variability, which means that while the payouts are not huge, they come up frequently.

All the symbols are in line with the Hawaiian theme, and you won't find any traditional playing cards. The reels are adorned with pineapples, pink flowers, turquoise seashells, and Tiki sculptures in various colors and expressions. The game features both a Wild symbol and a Scatter symbol.

Aloha! Cluster Pays has an unusual gameplay experience as it does not rely on aligning symbols from left to right but on clustering of symbols for a win. Therefore, to score a win, you need to cluster between 9 to 30 symbols. If the cluster is not large enough for a win, it remains stuck on the reels to increase the chances of a lucky cluster on the next spin.

The game also features a unique free spins mechanism that excludes lower-paying symbols like flowers and shells, thereby increasing the odds of a larger and more lucrative win. To improve your chances of winning, you can use the Wild symbol to replace any other symbol in the game. Overall, Aloha! Cluster Pays is an exciting and vibrant slot game that is sure to transport you to a tropical paradise.

raw_translation.response:
Aloha! Cluster Pays is an online slot game that will take you on a virtual journey to the crystal clear waters of Hawaii. The game, developed by NetEnt, not only boasts stunning visuals but also offers exciting gameplay.

With 6 reels, unlike the conventional 5, and unique paylines, this game presents an opportunity to win big. The minimum bet starts at as little as €0.10, while the maximum is €200, suiting both casual and high-stakes players. The symbols in Aloha! Cluster Pays are all related to Hawaiian culture, such as pineapples, flowers, shells, and the Tiki. response.headline: Gameplay and rules
response.content: Aloha! Cluster Pays has six reels and five rows of symbols instead of the traditional five reels. The game features Aloha Cluster Pays, which means that the symbols don't have to be aligned from left to right. They can appear anywhere on the reels, but they must be in clusters of at least nine symbols to count for a win. The betting range varies from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €200, making it ideal for both casual players and high rollers.

response.headline: Visual design and theme
response.content: Aloha! Cluster Pays has an excellent aesthetic design with a backdrop of a white sandy beach, a volcano, and colorful flowers and palm trees of Hawaii. The Tiki sculpture, a religious symbol of Hawaiian culture, is also on the side of your screen. The reels are adorned with various symbols such as pineapples, pink flowers, turquoise seashells, and Tiki sculptures in various colors and expressions. The game's sounds are authentic to Hawaii and perfectly complement the excellent graphics, making you feel as if you're on the island.

response.headline: Free spins mechanism
response.content: Aloha! Cluster Pays has a unique free spins mechanism that excludes low-paying symbols like flowers and seashells, increasing your chances of landing a higher payout. The free spins are activated when you land three or more Scatter symbols. You'll receive between 9 and 12 free spins depending on the number of Scatters you land. In the free spins round, the game adds a symbol drop mechanic, where lower-paying symbols are removed from the reels after each spin. You can re-trigger up to a maximum of 60 free spins.

response.headline: Volatility and RTP
response.content: Aloha! Cluster Pays has a 96.4% RTP, which means that the game has a medium to low volatility and variability. It implies that the payouts are not significant, but they come up frequently. The game's low variance is suitable for players who prefer to play it safe and have a more extended playtime. It is not ideal for players who enjoy high-risk games with significant payouts.

response.headline: Wild and Scatter symbols
response.content: Aloha! Cluster Pays features both a Wild and a Scatter symbol. The Wild symbol is the Tiki Mask, which can replace any other symbol in the game, increasing your chances of creating a winning combination. The Scatter symbol is the postage stamp, which activates the free spins round when you land three or more of them. The game's symbols are all in line with the Hawaiian theme, and you won't find any traditional playing cards.

This slot game stands out from the rest with its unconventional gameplay - it has six reels instead of the usual five, offering incredible chances of winning. Furthermore, the total betting range varies from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €200, making it ideal for both casual players and high rollers.

With an RTP of 96.4%, Aloha! Cluster Pays has medium to low volatility and variability, which means that while the payouts are not huge, they come up frequently.

All the symbols are in line with the Hawaiian theme, and you won't find any traditional playing cards. The reels are adorned with pineapples, pink flowers, turquoise seashells, and Tiki sculptures in various colors and expressions. The game features both a Wild symbol and a Scatter symbol.

Aloha! Cluster Pays has an unusual gameplay experience as it does not rely on aligning symbols from left to right but on clustering of symbols for a win. Therefore, to score a win, you need to cluster between 9 to 30 symbols. If the cluster is not large enough for a win, it remains stuck on the reels to increase the chances of a lucky cluster on the next spin.

The game also features a unique free spins mechanism that excludes lower-paying symbols like flowers and shells, thereby increasing the odds of a larger and more lucrative win. To improve your chances of winning, you can use the Wild symbol to replace any other symbol in the game. Overall, Aloha! Cluster Pays is an exciting and vibrant slot game that is sure to transport you to a tropical paradise.

It's undoubtedly one of the most well-recognized symbols of Hawaiian culture, and it adds a unique charm to the overall design of the game. The reels themselves feature a range of delightful symbols, from pineapples, pink flowers, and seashells to Tiki sculptures in all sorts of colors and facial expressions.

What's more, the sounds in Aloha! Cluster Pays are just as incredible as its visuals. The game's developers have made sure that players are fully immersed in the Hawaiian culture by including authentic sounds that perfectly complement the stunning graphics. From the soft sound of waves crashing on the shore to the chirping of birds in the background, Aloha! Cluster Pays is nothing short of a sensory paradise.

All in all, this online slot game has an excellent visual design and a cohesive theme that will make you forget all your worries. Just sit back, relax, and enjoy some tropical-themed slot fun with Aloha! Cluster Pays.

response.headline: Experience the Unique Free Spins Mechanism of Aloha! Cluster Pays
response.content:
Who doesn't love free spins? Aloha! Cluster Pays is a slot game that takes the excitement up a notch with its unique free spins mechanism. Unlike other games where free spins are just a way to extend the gameplay, Aloha! Cluster Pays makes sure that each free spin counts.

When you activate the free spins by landing three or more Scatter symbols, you'll immediately notice the difference. The game excludes low-paying symbols like flowers and seashells in the free spins round, which increases your chances of significantly boosting your payout. Now that's a win-win situation!

Aloha! Cluster Pays' free spins round offers between nine and twelve spins, depending on how many Scatters you managed to land. But that's not all. The game also features a symbol drop mechanic, where lower-paying symbols are removed from the reels after each spin. The result? More chances of hitting big wins!

This tropical-themed game stands out from other online slots with its unique approach to free spins. But wait, it gets even better. You can re-trigger up to a maximum of 60 free spins, which could lead to some intense and profitable gameplay. Aloha! Cluster Pays is definitely a game you don't want to miss out on.

With such an original approach to free spins and the beautiful graphics, Aloha! Cluster Pays is a must-try game. Just remember to bring your sunglasses, because the sun is shining bright in this slot game.

response.headline: Get Ready to go Wild with Aloha! Cluster Pays
response.content:
Aloha! Cluster Pays is full of fun surprises and exciting features! One of the most intriguing aspects of this game is the Wild and Scatter symbols.

Let’s talk about that Wild symbol for a moment. The Tiki Mask is such a mischievous little character; it can replace any other symbol in the game, giving you an even better chance of hitting a winning combination. It's like having a Hawaiian good luck charm right there on the reels!

Now, let’s talk about the Scatter symbol. It looks just like a postage stamp, but don’t let that fool you; it can activate the game's awesome free spins round when you land three or more of them. It's like getting a tropical vacation for free, all thanks to this little stamp.

And let's not forget the overall Hawaiian theme of the game! Aloha! Cluster Pays transports you right to the beautiful beaches of Hawaii, with symbols that include coconuts, pineapples, and even a guitar. And the best part? No boring traditional playing cards in sight!

If you're looking for a little paradise in your slot game experience, Aloha! Cluster Pays is the perfect game for you. So put on your lei, grab your ukulele, and get ready to win big in the sun-drenched world of Aloha! Cluster Pays!

response.headline: Gameplay Mechanics
response.content:
Aloha! Cluster Pays is a six-reel game that adopts an unusual gameplay style. We're used to aligning symbols from left to right, but this game has decided to spice things up by clustering symbols! Now you can finally say you're good at clustering things - and win some coins while you're at it!

What's better than aligning three symbols? Aligning 30! Yes, you read that right. Get ready to cluster between 9 to 30 symbols to score big wins. And the best part? The cluster remains on the reels, just like that friend who doesn't know when to leave the party, increasing your chances of a lucky cluster on the next spin.

With all the clustering going on, we half-expected the game to turn into a family reunion. Unfortunately, there were no relatives to be seen, but we did spot some funky tiki masks and garlands. We must say, the designers nailed the tropical vibe of the game - or maybe it was just the Mai Tais talking.

response.headline: Visuals
response.content:
NetEnt has done it again! They've created a visual masterpiece that'll have you questioning whether you're really sitting in your living room or lounging on a beach in Hawaii.

The white sandy beach, distant volcano, colorful flowers, and palm trees all come together to make you feel as if you've been whisked away to a tropical paradise. And let's not forget about the Tiki sculpture - an excellent touch that adds authenticity to the game.

But what really steals the show are the graphics - they're vibrant, crisp, and full of life. The pineapples look good enough to eat, the pink flowers are so pretty you'll want to pick them, and the turquoise seashells will make you wish you were diving into the ocean to find some of your own.

And can we talk about the Tiki sculptures? They come in various colors and expressions, and each one is just as entertaining as the last. Some are silly, some are grumpy, and some are downright cute. No matter which one pops up on your screen, you can't help but smile.

In short, the visuals in Aloha! Cluster Pays are so amazing, you'll want to buy a one-way ticket to Hawaii just to see if it lives up to the game's standards. (Spoiler alert: it does).

Review:
 
Gameplay and rules

Aloha! Cluster Pays has six reels and five rows of symbols instead of the traditional five reels. The game features Aloha Cluster Pays, which means that the symbols don't have to be aligned from left to right. They can appear anywhere on the reels, but they must be in clusters of at least nine symbols to count for a win. The betting range varies from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €200, making it ideal for both casual players and high rollers.

Visual design and theme

Aloha! Cluster Pays has an excellent aesthetic design with a backdrop of a white sandy beach, a volcano, and colorful flowers and palm trees of Hawaii. The Tiki sculpture, a religious symbol of Hawaiian culture, is also on the side of your screen. The reels are adorned with various symbols such as pineapples, pink flowers, turquoise seashells, and Tiki sculptures in various colors and expressions. The game's sounds are authentic to Hawaii and perfectly complement the excellent graphics, making you feel as if you're on the island.

Free spins mechanism

Aloha! Cluster Pays has a unique free spins mechanism that excludes low-paying symbols like flowers and seashells, increasing your chances of landing a higher payout. The free spins are activated when you land three or more Scatter symbols. You'll receive between 9 and 12 free spins depending on the number of Scatters you land. In the free spins round, the game adds a symbol drop mechanic, where lower-paying symbols are removed from the reels after each spin. You can re-trigger up to a maximum of 60 free spins.

Volatility and RTP

Aloha! Cluster Pays has a 96.4% RTP, which means that the game has a medium to low volatility and variability. It implies that the payouts are not significant, but they come up frequently. The game's low variance is suitable for players who prefer to play it safe and have a more extended playtime. It is not ideal for players who enjoy high-risk games with significant payouts.

Wild and Scatter symbols

Aloha! Cluster Pays features both a Wild and a Scatter symbol. The Wild symbol is the Tiki Mask, which can replace any other symbol in the game, increasing your chances of creating a winning combination. The Scatter symbol is the postage stamp, which activates the free spins round when you land three or more of them. The game's symbols are all in line with the Hawaiian theme, and you won't find any traditional playing cards.

Visually stunning, this game boasts an exceptional aesthetic with a white sandy beach backdrop, a distant volcano, and colorful flowers and palm trees. You will also find the Tiki sculpture, a religious symbol of Hawaiian culture, on the side of your screen. Immerse yourself in the authentic sounds of Hawaii, which accompanied by the vibrant graphics will have you feeling as if you're truly on the island.

This slot game stands out from the rest with its unconventional gameplay - it has six reels instead of the usual five, offering incredible chances of winning. Furthermore, the total betting range varies from a minimum of €0.10 to a maximum of €200, making it ideal for both casual players and high rollers.

With an RTP of 96.4%, Aloha! Cluster Pays has medium to low volatility and variability, which means that while the payouts are not huge, they come up frequently.

All the symbols are in line with the Hawaiian theme, and you won't find any traditional playing cards. The reels are adorned with pineapples, pink flowers, turquoise seashells, and Tiki sculptures in various colors and expressions. The game features both a Wild symbol and a Scatter symbol.

Aloha! Cluster Pays has an unusual gameplay experience as it does not rely on aligning symbols from left to right but on clustering of symbols for a win. If the cluster is not large enough for a win, it remains stuck on the reels to increase the chances of a lucky cluster on the next spin.

The game also features a unique free spins mechanism that excludes lower-paying symbols like flowers and shells, thereby increasing the odds of a larger and more lucrative win.
